reed.title: Coaching & Mentoring - Advanced CPD Accredited Course
reed.descr: This was one of my favourite courses to do. Learning about the distinction between the 2, I find that I enjoy coaching a lot more, but that mentoring is more fulfilling in the long run.

reed.title: Leadership and Management
reed.descr: I remember being interested in this when my brother and I were discussing these differences during his Masters. I am more of a manager then a leader, especially right now.

reed.title: Project Management : Project Manager Advanced Diploma
reed.descr: Project Management has had many faces and facets, from Waterfall to Agile. I find that I am interested in the idea of project management more than the practical.

reed.title: Mental Health First Aid Level 5
reed.descr: I've heard it elsewhere that developers are very bad at telling their own signs of stress at work. In part, I wanted to take this course to get a better understanding. It didn't really work, but I am learning more and more! ðŸ˜…

udemy.title: Master D3.js with Concepts & 25+ Projects | ~43 Hours
udemy.descr: Many years ago, my old boss heard about D3.js for data visualisation. I am not a JavaScript developer, so this was my first exposure to both JS AND D3.js. I found it to be very bespoken and may not be very repeatable, but I would like to do more!

udemy.title: 100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp
udemy.descr: I've been a Python developer for ~10 years, and there are still parts of the language I don't know about! This is the perfect course to round out those edges.

udemy.title: ADVANCED Time Management Strategies For Top-1% Productivity
udemy.descr: If there is one thing I struggle with is managing my time. I have many hobbies, many interests, and often not enough time or energy to dedicate myself to them.

udemy.title: The Complete Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
udemy.descr: I heard a lot about this React framework on JavaScript that makes it more of an object-oriented language, like Python. Why not explore it?

agile.title: Professional Scrum Master 1
agile.descr: This was a 2-day workshop that also included doing the PSM1 exam, which I passed. The course itself was nice, but I did wish it was more... practical. Find my certificate here.
